Package taskallocation

Contains all the components required for tasks management amongst workers. This package encapsulates the core task allocation logic of the distributed system without dealing with the actual implementation of the task. Each task is represented as Task.

ITaskManager is the primary interface for this package.

TaskAllocationServer and TaskAllocationClient hold the task requests handling logic (communication between master and worker for tasks. For heartbeat communication, please check heartbeat).

ITaskExecutor is the interface that all applications using task management components of this package must implement.

Author:
somilgupta
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ITaskExecutor
    Interface for the execution to be done by the worker once task is allocated to it by the master.
    ITaskManager
    Interface for the component that manages task allocation and availability.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Task
    Represents a single unit of task allocated by the word count master to the worker that it needs to execute and notify completed.
    TaskAllocationClient
    Worker client to request task allocation from master.
    TaskAllocationServer
    Handles task allocation requests from workers and calls TaskManager to allocate tasks to them.
    TaskManager
    Implementation of ITaskManager.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NoTaskAvailableException
    Exception thrown when there is no task available to allocate.
